name: I want wine
description:
'I want wine' is my game for the gamejam 'Tu juego a Juicio Jam 2021'

https://itch.io/jam/tu-juego-a-juicio-jam-2021

Play as a pirate that only wants to drink wine, go in search of all the wine reserves in the longes ship.

Be aware of the enemies and reach them with your long sword, but be careful, you don't want to get stuck!
